title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 35.15 - Wallet-size certification of birth; fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 35.15 - Wallet-size certification of birth; fee

State Regulations

Each applicant for a wallet-size certification of birth shall remit to the commissioner with such application a fee of $15 in payment for the search of the files and records and the furnishing of the wallet-size certification if such record is found or for a certification that a search discloses no record of a birth.
